articles.title: Video: NASA's latest MOXIE experiment offers hope for human exploration on Mars - CNN
articles.description: NASA’s Perseverance rover mission has successfully been making oxygen from Mars’ carbon dioxide-rich atmosphere in a series of tests using the Mars Oxygen In-Situ Resource Utilization Experiment, better known as MOXIE. CNN’s Kristin Fisher has more.
